import{useEffect}from'react';/* ------------------------------------------------------

 * ------------------------------------------------------
 */export const useContentLoader=()=>{useEffect(()=>{// Add the 'loaded' class after a delay
const timer=setTimeout(()=>{document.querySelector(".content").classList.add("loaded");},50);// Function to remove 'loaded' class
const beforeUnloadHandler=()=>{document.querySelector(".content").classList.remove("loaded");};// Listen to the 'beforeunload' event
window.addEventListener("beforeunload",beforeUnloadHandler);// Cleanup function
return()=>{clearTimeout(timer);window.removeEventListener("beforeunload",beforeUnloadHandler);};},[]);// This effect runs only once on mount
};
